# Introduction

This document shows how we can leverage the `h2o` framework for machine learning.

# Section 1

```{r}
pacman::p_load(data.table, h2o, tidyverse)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
